page.title: 16Housing Part 1
page.content: Northborough has a cross-section of housing types. The area is very historical and parts of Church Street date back to Cromwellian times. Hence, many of the cottages along Church Street are 4-500 years old, stone built, thatched with small windows. Only a few of the children attending Northborough School live in these houses. Many of the children live in an estate built in the early 1960's centred around Granville Avenue.These houses are in the middle price range, (Â£35-40,000). On the edges of Northborough,there are the bigger detached houses, (Â£50-100,000). Maxey is a similer villge to Northborough in the types of houses, ranging from old cottages to brand new housing.
